# Examples

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(bbmle)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```
```{r}
library(bbmle)

x <- 0:10
y <- c(26, 17, 13, 12, 20, 5, 9, 8, 5, 4, 8)
d <- data.frame(x,y)

fit <- mle2(y ~ dpois(lambda = ymean),
            start = list(ymean = mean(y)), data = d)

tidy(fit)
```
